name: quadrantica
description: The pillars of light and color have sunk beneath the ocean, and an ashen gray has overcome the world - raise them back up by putting your logical thinking and deductive reasoning to the test.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c support or higher, shader model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
